thread.title: Brandon Knight Tries to Stop a Big Man From Dunking, Gets Posterized Again
thread.title_full: Brandon Knight Tries to Stop a Big Man From Dunking, Gets Posterized Again | Complex

author: Brett Pollakoff
title: Brandon Knight Tries to Stop a Big Man From Dunking, Gets Posterized Again
text:
Brandon Knight now plays for the Phoenix Suns , but if the name sounds familiar, it's almost certainly because of something that happened when he was a member of the Detroit Pistons back in 2013.
Knight was on the wrong end of one of the most ferocious dunks in NBA history , when DeAndre Jordan took a lob pass from Chris Paul and threw it down while the two were in midair, which completely annihilated Knight in the process.
This one from last night's preseason contest against the Rockets (courtesy of Clint Capela) wasn't quite at that level, but given the fact that Knight has a long list of embarrassing moments on the hardwood, you'd think that by now he would have learned not to put himself in these types of situations.
